title: Destinos: an introduction to Spanish. Pt. 2
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Spain - Social life and customs
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Foreign language films
description: A series of introductory Spanish language programs with each program structured carefully so that three kinds of Spanish are used: conversational Spanish spoken by the characters in the drama, the narrator's Spanish and the Spanish spoken by the instructor, Raquel, who breaks in periodically during the episode to explain and reinforce particular language structures and grammar. We also learn about the Spanish speaking world, its culture, life and customs.
